"@string/app_name" is a participatory sensing campaign geared towards identifying, describing and mapping community housing conditions in Boyle Heights. With this Android application you can describe your home and assist in a community data collection effort. The goal of this application is to...

Press \"Menu\" and select \"Survey\" to be taken to the survey form. Answer the questions on that page and snap a picture of the fountain to help us better keep track of all the fountains that have been mapped. Once you are finished click \"Upload\" and your responses will be sent to http://we-tap.appspot.com where they will be automatically displayed on a live map!
